title: Curriculum Vitae
text:
Experience

Sr. Manager1, Claims Analytics
Co-operators General Insurance Co. | Montreal, QC January 2020 — Present
Claims Business partners needing Data & Analytics solutions to drive better decision-making
Dealt with business problems ranging from workforce management, work (claim) segmentation & assignment, quality assurance & risk control, vendor management and process improvement
Settling claims is the insurance promise made to ~950K policyholders; ~$2B average payout per year. Its workforce is ~1600 employees reporting to 8-10 Assistant Vice-presidents (AVPs) having similar but often unique and competing needs. Data & Analytics maturity is low and developing
Acted as Product Owner; Facilitated the elicitation of business problems & decisions with senior leaders where data & insights are useful; helped them define priorities and develop actionable plans; drafted business cases, influenced initiation and planning of foundational projects & products; supported execution and delivery of value by articulating needs to data & analytics team members and validated end products
Skills: Strategic Planning | Tactical Planning | Problem Definition | Solution Design | Project/Product Management | Persuasive Communication
Data & Analytics professionals needing strong leadership and a supportive environment to thrive
The need was to build and grow a team of data & analytics professionals, raise team/individual performance & engagement while ensuring the work of the team meets business needs and high quality standards
It was important because of a rapid and significant increase in demand and rising expectations from Claims partners for decision-making with data. As well, it was about promoting the professional and personal well being of a group of ~ 15-30 team members directly or indirectly
Defined team mandates, roles & responsibilities and performance expectations; Hired 15+ data professionals; Influenced & implemented two restructures; Evaluated & rewarded achievement of goals;
Defined and negotiated operating and service models with Claims and other partners; Defined related workflows (intake, prioritization, execution) and implemented agile delivery principles; Built and implemented change management plans;
Acted as technical supervisor, providing support and coaching on technical matters; Accompanied team members in their career development
Skills: People Leadership | Performance Management | Recruitment | Negotiation | Change Management | Technical Supervision
